name: Info War
description:
In Info War, you play as Alex Jones - Infamous right-wing radio host and conspiracy theorist. It's just another day in the Infowars Studio until suddenly you find yourself under attack, with the attackers being none other than George Soros with his own personal army. 

It's up to you to defend the Infowars studio from the evil Globalists in this epic round based shooter.

Dramatic description aside this game does contain a fair amount of bugs as well as simple missing features. I've since moved onto to other projects, however if people like this game I would consider doing more work on it.
